article:
Good morning, everyone. I want to _ you about my neighbor ,Mr. White. There are _ people in Mr. White's family. Mr. White is a manager of a big shop. Mrs. White teaches English in a university .Her students like her very much _ she is interesting. The Whites have two _ . The son is Tim. He is thirteen. The daughter is Nell. She is twelve. There is also a brown _ in their family. _ name is Stella.
Mr. White loves sports and he is good at playing tennis. Mrs. White likes _ . She draws many beautiful pictures. Tim _ listening to music. He has many CDs. Justin Bieber is his favorite singer. _ is Nell's hobby? She likes doing some _ . She has a lot of books in her room now. On Sunday, then take their cat to the nark and they often have a .good time there.
